pageTitle: Itinerary for Friday, April 7, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Friday, April 7, 2017:

Dartmouth, Nova Scotia

4 p.m. The Prime Minister will visit the Nova Scotia Skills Competition and highlight initiatives outlined in Budget 2017. A media availability will follow.

Nova Scotia Community College
Waterfront Campus
80 Mawiomi Place
Dartmouth, Nova Scotia

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity for visit and open coverage for media availability
  • Media should arrive no later than 3:00 p.m. and present themselves to media registration


Note: all times local
